name: Kevin Keegan's Player Manager
overview: State of the art soccer management simulation and world famous KICK OFF, played independently or interlinked. KICK OFF - one or two players option. Numerous skill levels, Challenge Cup and practice option. MANAGER - 3 Management skill levels. 3 division league and 2 Cup competitions. Options to play on the pitch or watch or get computer predicted results. Played in REAL TIME - other 47 Managers are actively managing their clubs under same pressures as you. Lively transfer market due to strict financial controls. Physics, Scouts, promotion and relegation battles are all there and as in real life, create pressure cooker game environment. Player Manager is truly rich in its depth and is highly addictive.
